Uses of Criterion in org.criteria4jpa
 

Methods in org.criteria4jpa with parameters of type Criterion
 Criteria Criteria.add(Criterion criterion)
          Add a Criterion to specify constraints on the results that the query should return.
 

Uses of Criterion in org.criteria4jpa.criterion
 

Classes in org.criteria4jpa.criterion that implement Criterion
 class BetweenExpression
          Class representing a "between" restriction.
 class Conjunction
          Class representing a conjunction.
 class Disjunction
          Class representing a disjunction.
 class IsEmptyExpression
          Class representing a "is empty" or "is not empty" restriction.
 class IsNullExpression
          Class representing a "is null" or "is not null" restriction.
 class Junction
          Base class for Conjunction and Disjunction
 class SimpleExpression
          Basic restriction class for simple expressions "equals", "greater than", "like" and others.
 

Methods in org.criteria4jpa.criterion that return Criterion
static Criterion Restrictions.between(String relativePath, Object lo, Object hi)
          Adds a "between" constraint to a persistent field.
static Criterion Restrictions.isEmpty(String relativePath)
          Adds a "is empty" constraint to a collection-valued relationship field.
static Criterion Restrictions.isNotEmpty(String relativePath)
          Adds a "is not empty" constraint to a collection-valued relationship field.
static Criterion Restrictions.isNotNull(String relativePath)
          Adds a "is not null" constraint to a persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Criterion Restrictions.isNull(String relativePath)
          Adds a "is null" constraint to a persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Criterion Restrictions.notBetween(String relativePath, Object lo, Object hi)
          Adds a "not between" constraint to a persistent field.
